boardgame.name: Heroes of Land, Air _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Sea
boardgame.description: Heroes of Land, Air _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Sea is a 4X-style board game with miniatures that tells the epic tale of orcs vs. humans, dwarves vs. elves, battling kingdoms, and the individuals who turn the tides of war._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players control one of these classic factions, competing to expand their kingdom into new territory. Even the greatest kingdoms begin as small townships, therefore players begin with only a basic town hall, a couple of peons, and a single warrior. From there, players must explore the territory around them, build up their work force, fortify their army, and develop their kingdom _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; all through careful action selection, exploitation, war, and resource management._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As players reach milestones in the development of their kingdom, they gain access to many advantages. Peons become warriors, warriors become powerful heroes, and town halls eventually become castles. Players gain access to water, and even air, vessels and creatures. Boarding these vessels and creatures with your units allows for faster travel across the vast game board and for positioning armies for powerful attacks._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;War in Heroes of Land, Air _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Sea features a cost/reward system carefully detailed on tactics cards from which players must secretly choose. The availability of these tactics cards depends on the units participating in the war. It is here that players wage their wits and legacy in an attempt to exterminate one another. For as we all know, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;history is written by the victors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Heroes of Land, Air _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Sea also boasts two economic systems, one being the risky acquisition and careful management of the resources (food, ore and mana), while the other is a twist on worker placement that requires the leveraging of peons to construct buildings, peons that could otherwise be exploring, expanding, exploiting, and exterminating! Finding this balance is crucial to victory!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Spoke with Gamelyn. They are able to do an official pledge transfer. Delivery expected for March 2018 You are buying the DELUXE Pledge with shipping included (USA; extra charges may apply for international pledgers).

Fresh off the KS presses. Will ship world wide but additional shipping, VAT, customs are the responsibility of the buyer.

Kickstarter Deluxe Edition!!! This comes with the base game (four factions), the expansion (four additional factions), Mercenaries Promo Pack 1 (four mercenaries), Mercenaries Promo Pack 2 (two additional mercenaries), the Nomad Mini Expansion (10 nomad minis), and 2 sets of the Siege Engine Mini Expansion (4 siege towers, 4 ballistae, 4 catapults). Everything is assembled but in excellent shape. I would not call it _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;like new_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; because some of the cardboard pieces have some wear, but honestly I think it is going to happen no matter what when constructing them. You can watch the video by Gamelyn Games on constructing the cardboard pieces and you can see that sometimes the cardboard splits. So basically, I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t want to say it is perfect, but I wouldn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t say there are any glaring problems at all. All of the minis are accounted for and in excellent shape. Some of the thinner ones could use a dip in warm water and straightened up, but that is nothing out of the ordinary for a game with so many minis. Everything was put into the 2 big boxes and everything is in bags. The boxes are in perfect condition except for a slight tear in the artwork on the vertical edge of the bottom/inner box. You can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t see it at all when the top is on. All cards are sleeved so they are in perfect condition. If you want photos or have any questions let me know. Thanks for looking!

Shipping costs / Versandkosten: Germany: 5,00 € (egal, wie viele Artikel ihr bei uns kauft) EU Countries: 15,00 € (regardless how much articles You order from us) Rest of the World: We send You a mail with the shipping costs All games are new and in their original wrapping and all prices include the German VAT (7% or 19%). If You live outside the EU You don´t have to pay the German VAT (we send You the new, lower price with the confirmation). We offer only goods that we have in stock, You can also visit our onlineshop www.gamers-hq.de for more games Payment may be made by Paypal (no extra fee) or bank transfer in advance. If you have any questions, feel free to send us an email (laden@gamers-hq.de), give us a call (+49 30 79706126) or visit our homepage (www.gamers-hq.de). If You´re a German buyer, just read the text below (“…innerhalb Deutschlands gilt:..”) You find our term _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; conditions here: https://gamers-hq.de/en/terms-conditions Innerhalb Deutschlands gilt: Alle Spiele sind Neuware und in Orginalverpackung . Alle Preise sind inklusive der gesetzlichen Mehrwertsteuer von 7% bzw. 19%. Bezahlt werden kann per paypal, Vorauskasse, Bankeinzug oder direkt bei uns im Laden (wenn ihr aus Berlin kommt). Wenn ihr noch irgendwelche Fragen habt, ruft uns an (030 79706126), schickt uns ne Mail (laden@gamers-hq.de) oder besucht unsere Homepage (www.gamers-hq.de). Unsere AGB findet ihr hier : https://gamers-hq.de/agb

Played once - all minis assembled. Kickstarter edition with pre-painted Leaders. Includes: Base Game Order and Chaos expansion Siege Engines Mini Expansion Nomads Mini Expansion Mercenaries Expansion #1 Mercenaries Expansion #2

Includes the expansion Order _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Chaos, the custom sleeves for all cards, and the massive limited game mat. Everything is assembled and in great condition - some of the buildings have been taped as suggested in the instructions to add durability (nothing is glued). This will save many hours of work and frustration. Full disclosure - a kickstarter reprint is going on now, but I figured a buyer may want to get this game ASAP and not wait for the reprint. Shipping for both boxes and the mat will come to $28 (these are huge). It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s very possible some of the pieces may need some slight repair, but I will pack the constructs well.

THIS IS FOR THE PLAYMAT! https://www.gamelyngames.com/heroes-of-land-air-sea/heroes-of-land-air-sea-oversized-play-mat It was never used (never taken out of the box actually). This should save you approximately $18-20 vs ordering it direct from Gamelyn. Might as well get it to someone who will use it :) Buyer pays shipping using whichever service they would prefer.
